Title: Grotesque
Plot: A serial killer is captured after a three year manhunt, and he claims an evil spirit is responsible for the crimes. When the killings continue as he sits in jail, Mulder's battle with a former colleague gets more heated when he suggests that something more paranormal may be involved.
GuestStars: Greg Thirloway, Susan Bain, Kasper Michaels, Zoran Vukelic, John Milton Brandon, James McDonnell, Paul J. Anderson, Amanda O'Leary, Levani Outchaneichvili, Kurtwood Smith
